column3: Log in to your publisher account
Go to Settings under My Account

column4: Your account page is shown
Your ID and email address are displayed
You can see your user roles but you cannot edit them

column3: Modify your name and click "Update Account"

column4: You receive a flash message saying your record is updated
Your name has been updated

column3: Modify your email address to one which is already in use in the system and click "Update Account"

column4: You see a warning at the top which says: Are you sure you want to change your email address? You will be logged out + will need to verify your account again.
You see an error message under 'Email address': Email address is already in use

column3: Modify the email address to a new one which does not exist and click Update Account

column4: You see a warning at the top which says: Are you sure you want to change your email address? You will be logged out + will need to verify your account again.
You are logged out and are taken to the home page
You see a message which says: Email address updated. You have been logged out for email address verification.
You see a message which says:  Debug mode - url for reset is /account/reset/39494d7f170f41439323dfa8cf8d392d

column3: Click  Debug mode - url for reset is /account/reset/39494d7f170f41439323dfa8cf8d392d and set a new password

column4: You are taken back to the home page and you are logged in
You see a message 'New password has been set and you're now logged in.'

column3: Go back to Settings under My Account

column4: Your new email address is stored
Your API Key at the top of the page is updated
You receive a flash message saying your record is updated and the API key has changed

column3: Enter mismatched passwords into the "Change your password" boxes and click "Update Account"

column4: You receive an error warning 'Passwords must match'

column3: Enter matching passwords into the "Change your password" boxes and click "Update"

column4: You receive a flash message saying your record is updated

column3: Click "logout" on the top right of the page

column4: You see a flash message confirming that you are logged out and you are taken to the home page

column3: Click "login" on the top right of the page
Log in with your updated password

column4: You see a Welcome back message
